tasks.task: Determine if flow control valves are necessary for sprinkler systems with mixed spray heads and rotors.
subtasks: Assess current water pressure in zones with spray heads.
Check water pressure requirements for rotors and spray heads.
Calculate water pressure when rotors receive 50 psi.
Understand the effect of high pressure on spray heads (misting).
Evaluate benefits of installing flow control valves for pressure regulation.
Research more detailed information about pressure control and sprinkler parts.

tasks.task: Understand factors influencing irrigation system performance.
subtasks: Identify different types of sprinkler heads (example: rotors, spray heads).
Note pressure requirements for each type.
Consider the impact of inconsistent pressure across zones.
Evaluate the role of water pressure in proper spray distribution.
Recognize the need for even irrigation coverage across the yard.

tasks.task: Learn about the role of Sprinkler Warehouse in irrigation solutions.
subtasks: Note the availability of extensive resources (e.g., website, customer service).
Recognize the value of their expertise in irrigation.

tasks.task: Subscribe and engage with Sprinkler Warehouse's content.
subtasks: Access their channel for more how-to videos.
Follow their page for irrigation tips.
Engage with customer service for product questions.
